Name: TrickShot
About the game: TrickShot is a fun single-player VR game with a challenge like no other!. With three different modes, you can have endless amounts of fun while you try to get a high score or beat the level. See how good you are at throwing a ball that challenges your strategy, quick thinking, and hand-eye coordination. This game is being released in an alpha state in order to get community feedback so that this game evolves into something everyone loves. The current goals are to add Steam achievements and a Leader board so that you can see how you fare against the rest of the world. TrickShot will be the game everyone wants to play when they come over! So keep coming back to see the updates and passion I will continue to put into the game. Keep in touch, I welcome all feedback and ideas.
Meta Title: TrickShot: May 7, 2020, Danielle Metz and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on TrickShot? Check out the release date (May 7, 2020), developer insights from Danielle Metz, and a complete game summary.
